name: Corrupt-O-Bots
description:
Destroy enemy Spiders with your army of Robots, but be careful. Your robots can be corrupted and turn on you. Go for a High Score! Controls:
  • Move --- WASD or Arrows
  • Spawn Bots --- Right Click, Left Click, Scroll Wheel Click
    • Red Bot (left click) --- seeks and destroys
    • Blue Bot (right click) --- slows enemies
    • Green Bot (scroll click) --- turret
  • Restart after Game Over --- Left Click
